JobFullDesc: As the Contingent Workforce Program Compliance Lead you will ensure Compliance is at the fore to inform our Contingent Workforce Acquisition process, experience and roadmap. This role works across the Contingent Workforce team to support strategies and planning for all team priorities as well as with cross-functional partners. The successful candidate will be highly process driven and detail-oriented. The position will have a day-to-day focus on Compliance spanning global privacy regimes like General Data Protection Regulation, onboarding requirements, data management and retention, audit management, training & education, and contract management. Key cross-functional partners will include Sourcing, Learning & Development, Internal Audit, Legal and HR Technology. The ideal candidate will be passionate about Facebook’s mission, have a background in Contingent Workforce management and Compliance and can effectively analyze and communicate strategic
